attributes.action: introduce a bill for Proportional Representation to take effect for the next general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taking notice of recent opinion polls etc.. which indicate the strong likelihood of a possible change of Government after the next General Election and in order to avoid undoing all the good work done by the Government in recent years, in order to better represent the people of Britian etc.. - the undersigned urge the Government to introduce a PR bill now. To take effect for the next General Election.
